title: Intentions for the Week
description: Intentions for the Week- Week 48 in 2024 Hi hiiiiii! Happy Monday, folks! How was your weekend? We laid low and got work done around the house! I didn’t do meal prep yesterday, but I did use my time in Self-Check-In to map out what we need for Thanksgiving. If you need help planning for the week, I wrote a Thanksgiving Meal Prep post about it!  Here are my Intentions for the Week!  Intentions this Week  This week’s intentions:  Mind/Body morning pages/ morning routine 30 minutes no screen after wakeup fill out my Intentions for the week calendar keep track of what I eat in my food journal keep track of movement on Apple watch workout every day work on currently workbook- November spread give thanks spend quality time with Cooper  check in with calendar  art time make a packing list  floss daily horoscope connect with my spirit  work in my hobonichi cousin outdoor time/hike? pull cards/journal/video watch how much time I spend on the phone tweeze things paint nails eating meeting clean house + phone a friend use my diffuser steam facial take vitamins  stay hydrated  read before bed work on package for E & HJH quality time with my cats get enough sleep Work: intentions for the week  i love lists  record stuff my everyday life hope circuit check in SELF Check In!  upload/edit photos  favorite things post!  brainstorm recipes post School Lunch template recipe testing- pumpkin! work on Currently Workbook  make video for currently workbook  work on THC clean up office package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club  (THANK YOU!) catch up pinning on my Pinterest account Tailwind meal prep/make video catch up on social media clean up workspace  bookkeeping/pay bills emails  go to P.O. Box Home grocery shop declutter shit laundry  litterboxes yard work water indoor plants  water plants on deck go through pantry  compost/worm bin wash dish towels clean kitchen clear off stairs clear off dining room table vac stairs pack/unpack clean bathrooms pickup the deck clean out car straighten up garage  refill pill case garbage/recycling Last Week’s Intentions:  Mind/Body morning pages/ morning routine 30 minutes no screen after wakeup fill out my Intentions for the week calendar keep track of what I eat in my food journal keep track of movement on Apple watch workout every day work on currently workbook check in with calendar  art time doc appt floss daily horoscope connect with my spirit  work in my hobonichi cousin outdoor time/hike? pull cards/journal/video watch how much time I spend on the phone tweeze things paint nails eating meeting clean house + phone a friend use my diffuser steam facial take vitamins  stay hydrated  read before bed send thank you note work on package for E & HJH quality time with my cats get enough sleep Work: intentions for the week  i love lists  record stuff my everyday life hope circuit check in SELF Check In!  upload/edit photos  edit/upload podcast  brainstorm recipes post School Lunch template recipe testing- pumpkin! work on Currently Workbook  make video for currently workbook  work on THC clean up office package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club  (THANK YOU!) catch up pinning on my Pinterest account Tailwind meal prep/make video catch up on social media clean up workspace  bookkeeping/pay bills emails  go to P.O. Box Home grocery shop declutter shit laundry  litterboxes yard work water indoor plants  water plants on deck go through pantry  compost/worm bin wash dish towels clean kitchen clear off stairs clear off dining room table vac stairs clean bathrooms pickup the deck clean out car straighten up garage  refill pill case garbage/recycling   Posts to Inspire: Thanksgiving Meal Prep Cranberry Ginger Shrub  The BEST Creamed Spinach Pecan Topped Sweet Potatoes  Wild Rice Mushroom Pilaf  No-Knead Cloverleaf Rolls Cranberry Cheese Danish Homemade Cranberry Sauce If you make a recipe from Shutterbean, tag me on Instagram! I’d love to see your creations!  Here’s a mood:   Mantra for the week! Feeling stuck? Make a list! Write down your intentions for the week to help hold you accountable for action.  My Intentions for the Week Calendar can help!!  You can start it at any time of the year! I also have a printable if you work well with a one-sheet. Here it is in a binder.  It’s part of my Time Management Printable pack!  Look, Mom! I made a video:   Need extra help? Join my accountability group-  SELF-CHECK-IN We spend Sunday mornings 9:00 AM PST-10:30 AM- PST working on our calendars and checking in together.  Those are my Intentions for the Week!  Wishing you a productive week. Take good care of YOU!    The post Intentions for the Week appeared first on Shutterbean.
excerpt: Intentions for the Week is a weekly TO DO list/planner started by Tracy Benjamin of Shutterbean.com & The Handwriting Club!
text: Intentions for the Week- Week 48 in 2024 Hi hiiiiii! Happy Monday, folks! How was your weekend? We laid low and got work done around the house!  I didn’t do meal prep yesterday, but I did use my time in Self-Check-In to map out what we need for Thanksgiving. If you need help planning for the week, I wrote a Thanksgiving Meal Prep post about it!  Here are my Intentions for the Week!  Intentions this Week  This week’s intentions:  Mind/Body morning pages/ morning routine 30 minutes no screen after wakeup fill out my Intentions for the week calendar keep track of what I eat in my food journal keep track of movement on Apple watch workout every day work on currently workbook- November spread give thanks spend quality time with Cooper  check in with calendar  art time make a packing list  floss daily horoscope connect with my spirit  work in my hobonichi cousin outdoor time/hike? pull cards/journal/video watch how much time I spend on the phone tweeze things paint nails eating meeting clean house + phone a friend use my diffuser steam facial take vitamins  stay hydrated  read before bed work on package for E & HJH quality time with my cats get enough sleep Work: intentions for the week  i love lists  record stuff my everyday life hope circuit check in SELF Check In!  upload/edit photos  favorite things post!  brainstorm recipes post School Lunch template recipe testing- pumpkin! work on Currently Workbook  make video for currently workbook  work on THC clean up office package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club  (THANK YOU!) catch up pinning on my Pinterest account Tailwind meal prep/make video catch up on social media clean up workspace  bookkeeping/pay bills emails  go to P.O. Box Home grocery shop declutter shit laundry  litterboxes yard work water indoor plants  water plants on deck go through pantry  compost/worm bin wash dish towels clean kitchen clear off stairs clear off dining room table vac stairs clean bathrooms pickup the deck clean out car straighten up garage  refill pill case garbage/recycling   Posts to Inspire: Thanksgiving Meal Prep Cranberry Ginger Shrub  The BEST Creamed Spinach Pecan Topped Sweet Potatoes  Wild Rice Mushroom Pilaf  No-Knead Cloverleaf Rolls Cranberry Cheese Danish Homemade Cranberry Sauce If you make a recipe from Shutterbean, tag me on Instagram! I’d love to see your creations!  Here’s a mood: Mantra for the week! Feeling stuck? Make a list! Write down your intentions for the week to help hold you accountable for action.  My Intentions for the Week Calendar can help!!   You can start it at any time of the year! I also have a printable if you work well with a one-sheet. Here it is in a binder.  It’s part of my Time Management Printable pack!  Look, Mom!  I made a video:   Need extra help? Join my accountability group-  SELF-CHECK-IN We spend Sunday mornings 9:00 AM PST-10:30 AM- PST working on our calendars and checking in together.  Those are my Intentions for the Week!  Wishing you a productive week. Take good care of YOU!
html:
Intentions for the Week- Week 48 in 2024

Hi hiiiiii! Happy Monday, folks! How was your weekend? We laid low and got work done around the house!  I didn’t do meal prep yesterday, but I did use my time in Self-Check-In to map out what we need for Thanksgiving. If you need help planning for the week, I wrote a Thanksgiving Meal Prep post about it! 

Here are my Intentions for the Week! 

Intentions this Week 

This week’s intentions: 

Mind/Body

  • morning pages/ morning routine
  • 30 minutes no screen after wakeup
  • fill out my Intentions for the week calendar
  • keep track of what I eat in my food journal
  • keep track of movement on Apple watch
  • workout every day
  • work on currently workbook- November spread
  • give thanks
  • spend quality time with Cooper 
  • check in with calendar 
  • art time
  • make a packing list 
  • floss daily
  • horoscope
  • connect with my spirit 
  • work in my hobonichi cousin
  • outdoor time/hike?
  • pull cards/journal/video
  • watch how much time I spend on the phone
  • tweeze things
  • paint nails
  • eating meeting
  • clean house + phone a friend
  • use my diffuser
  • steam facial
  • take vitamins 
  • stay hydrated 
  • read before bed
  • work on package for E & HJH
  • quality time with my cats
  • get enough sleep

Work:

  • intentions for the week 
  • i love lists 
  • record stuff
  • my everyday life
  • hope circuit check in
  • SELF Check In! 
  • upload/edit photos 
  • favorite things post! 
  • brainstorm recipes
  • post School Lunch template
  • recipe testing- pumpkin!
  • work on Currently Workbook 
  • make video for currently workbook 
  • work on THC
  • clean up office
  • package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club  (THANK YOU!)
  • catch up pinning on my Pinterest account
  • Tailwind
  • meal prep/make video
  • catch up on social media
  • clean up workspace 
  • bookkeeping/pay bills
  • emails 
  • go to P.O. Box

Home

  • grocery shop
  • declutter shit
  • laundry 
  • litterboxes
  • yard work
  • water indoor plants 
  • water plants on deck
  • go through pantry 
  • compost/worm bin
  • wash dish towels
  • clean kitchen
  • clear off stairs
  • clear off dining room table
  • vac stairs
  • pack/unpack
  • clean bathrooms
  • pickup the deck
  • clean out car
  • straighten up garage 
  • refill pill case
  • garbage/recycling

Last Week’s Intentions: 

Mind/Body

  • morning pages/ morning routine
  • 30 minutes no screen after wakeup
  • fill out my Intentions for the week calendar
  • keep track of what I eat in my food journal
  • keep track of movement on Apple watch
  • workout every day
  • work on currently workbook
  • check in with calendar 
  • art time
  • doc appt
  • floss daily
  • horoscope
  • connect with my spirit 
  • work in my hobonichi cousin
  • outdoor time/hike?
  • pull cards/journal/video
  • watch how much time I spend on the phone
  • tweeze things
  • paint nails
  • eating meeting
  • clean house + phone a friend
  • use my diffuser
  • steam facial
  • take vitamins 
  • stay hydrated 
  • read before bed
  • send thank you note
  • work on package for E & HJH
  • quality time with my cats
  • get enough sleep

Work:

  • intentions for the week 
  • i love lists 
  • record stuff
  • my everyday life
  • hope circuit check in
  • SELF Check In! 
  • upload/edit photos 
  • edit/upload podcast 
  • brainstorm recipes
  • post School Lunch template
  • recipe testing- pumpkin!
  • work on Currently Workbook 
  • make video for currently workbook 
  • work on THC
  • clean up office
  • package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club  (THANK YOU!)
  • catch up pinning on my Pinterest account
  • Tailwind
  • meal prep/make video
  • catch up on social media
  • clean up workspace 
  • bookkeeping/pay bills
  • emails 
  • go to P.O. Box

Home

  • grocery shop
  • declutter shit
  • laundry 
  • litterboxes
  • yard work
  • water indoor plants 
  • water plants on deck
  • go through pantry 
  • compost/worm bin
  • wash dish towels
  • clean kitchen
  • clear off stairs
  • clear off dining room table
  • vac stairs
  • clean bathrooms
  • pickup the deck
  • clean out car
  • straighten up garage 
  • refill pill case
  • garbage/recycling
  •  

Posts to Inspire:

Thanksgiving Meal Prep

Cranberry Ginger Shrub 

The BEST Creamed Spinach

Pecan Topped Sweet Potatoes 

Wild Rice Mushroom Pilaf 

No-Knead Cloverleaf Rolls

Cranberry Cheese Danish

Homemade Cranberry Sauce

If you make a recipe from Shutterbean, tag me on Instagram! I’d love to see your creations! 

Here’s a mood:

Mantra for the week!

Feeling stuck? Make a list! Write down your intentions for the week to help hold you accountable for action. 

My Intentions for the Week Calendar can help!!   You can start it at any time of the year!

I also have a printable if you work well with a one-sheet. Here it is in a binder. 

It’s part of my Time Management Printable pack! 

Look, Mom!  I made a video:

 

Need extra help? Join my accountability group- 

SELF-CHECK-IN

We spend Sunday mornings 9:00 AM PST-10:30 AM- PST working on our calendars and checking in together. 

Those are my Intentions for the Week! 

Wishing you a productive week. Take good care of YOU!
